metadata.title: CVE-2021-31254 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the tenc_box_read function in MP4Box in GPAC 1.0.1allows attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code viaa crafted file, related invalid IV sizes.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
